title: 이달의소녀탐구 #375 (LOONA TV #375)
summary:
The Second Day of Line&Up ends sucessfully.
0:01 -- HeeJin is looks really emotional. "It took a really long time to become the group LOOΠΔ and I know all of you have waited a long time. I can't thank you enough for the endless love and support~".
0:12 -- Everyone starts shedding tears. (I'm not crying, you are crying!)
0:20 -- MomSeul: "How was it everyone?" Chuu: I am really happy!"
HaSeul: "It was LOOΠΔ's very first performance as a group and yyxy performed here for the first time as well.
Yves: “Indeed. It is just that meaningful and touching moment for me"
0:41 -- Lippie mentions that she was quite nervous but the constant cheers encouraged her.
0:53 -- YeoJin (while everyone else is messing with her): We will wrap up the fan meeting now. There will be a group performance in August! Please look out for it!"
I guess that's it for pre-debut LOOΠΔ. Thanks guys. Thanks a lot for the past to years! They have been amazing!
